name: Fruit Girls 2: Hentai Jigsaw Photo Studio
name_original: Fruit Girls 2: Hentai Jigsaw Photo Studio
description:
WELCOME AGAIN TO THE JUICY WORLD OF THE FRUIT GIRLS!


The Fruit Girls you know are even spicier! This time The Photographer caught the girls in intimate moments of relaxation in the most diverse situations and locations. Complete the puzzles to access even more exciting scenes and make it to a final delicious sleepover with the five Fruit Girls!

UNIQUE HOT HENTAI GIRLS:


  • AMPHIRA, THE SWEET STRAWBERRY: Amphira has just finished her heavy pole dancing routine. She is still sweaty from the exertion and craves for a bath! The Sweet Strawberry then sits on the couch to take off her high heels and slides her hands down her legs to unbuckle the footwear buckles. By doing this, heat takes over her body. A heat she can't ignore...


  • JUNIPHER, THE SHY PAPAYA: Junipher is in the dressing-room getting ready to detonate her opponents in another e-sports championship. She's confident, but the tension that comes before going on stage is inevitable. When she bends over to finish putting on her panties, she finds in her backpack the solution to unleash her energies...


  • LOLLAIA, THE SOFT PEACH: Lollaia is ecstatic in her new Maid Neko outfit that has just arrived! She dressed as quickly as she could and spent hours looking at herself in the mirror in her new dress and playing with her feline tail. Bored already, she lay down on the floor and noticed that her tail came with an unusual accessory...


  • NERIN, THE NAUGHTY BANANA: Nerin had busy weeks. Full of rehearsals, recordings and more rehearsals… Determined to take a day off, she took advantage of her parents' trip that had left the house all to herself to finally enjoy the pool. The Naughty Banana put on her best bikini, grabbed her portable video game and threw herself on the deck chair without worrying about what others would see.


  • RHENELIS, THE CREAMY JABUTICABA: Rhenelis has just completed another major engineering project. Satisfied with her own success, she decides to spend the rest of the night reading comfortably in bed. After finishing another chapter of her book, The Creamy Jabuticaba decides to stop reading and relax with a hotter activity!


  • FRUIT SALAD: Be ready for a sleepover with all Fruit Girls forming a delicious Fruit Salad. After a few moments of relaxation and two or three glasses of champagne, all the girls joined the fun!

GAME FEATURES:

  • Five hot hentai girls with distinctive looks and unique personalities!
  • A delicious Fruit Salad scene where all Fruit Girls participate!
  • Finish all levels of each girl and give them some sticky love.
  • Customize your experience and difficulty level at will!
  • See all girls that you have unlocked in one place!
  • Unique holidays costumes for each girl!
  • Original music with a lo-fi feel!
  • Sexy sound effects recorded by a real voice actress!
  • Multiple achievements!
  • Extra content in free updates!
